snippet: A surprisingly strong third-quarter economic growth report led investors to believe the Federal Reserve would soon cut back its economic stimulus.
abstract: Stocks decline in worst day of trading since August 2013 as strong third-quarter economic growth causes traders to worry that the Federal Reserve would soon reduce its economic stimulus.
lead_paragraph: A surprisingly strong third-quarter economic growth report led investors to believe the Federal Reserve would soon cut back its economic stimulus.

headline.main: Upbeat Data Has Wall Street Downcast
headline.print_headline: Upbeat Data Has Wall Street Downcast
